  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:slike/200291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:slike/200291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Flag Tower ali Hanoiski stolp</string>
            <string language="en">Flag Tower or Tower of Hanoi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Markierungsfahne Aufsatz oder Aufsatz von Hanoi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tour d'indicateur ou tour de Hanoï</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Torre da bandeira ou torre de Hanoi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Torretta della bandierina o torretta di Hanoi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πύργος σημαιών ή πύργος του Ανόι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Torre del indicador o torre de Hanoi</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Stolp po katerem je dobil ime rekurzivni problem o premikanju ploščkov. Lokacija posnetka: Hanoi, Vietnam.</string>
            <string language="en">Tower that became famous due to the recursive disk puzzle. Location of a photo: Hanoi, Vietnam.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stolp</string>
            <string language="en">tower</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zastava</string>
            <string language="en">flag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vietnam</string>
            <string language="en">vietnam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hanoiski stolp</string>
            <string language="en">tower of hanoi</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tower, das zum rekursiven Plattepuzzlespiel 
berühmtes passendes wurde. Standort eines Fotos: Hanoi, 
Vietnam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dominez qui est devenu dû célèbre au puzzle 
récursif de disque. Emplacement d'une photo : Hanoï, 
Vietnam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eleve-se que se transformou  famoso devido ao 
enigma recursive do disco. Posição de uma foto: Hanoi, 
Vietnam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Torreggi su che si è transformato in in famoso 
dovuto il puzzle ricorsivo del disco. Posizione di una foto: 
Hanoi, Vietnam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πύργος που έγινε διάσημος οφειλόμενος στον 
επαναλαμβανόμενο γρίφο δίσκων. Θέση μιας φωτογραφίας: 
Ανόι, Βιετνάμ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elévese que se convirtió en  famoso debido al 
rompecabezas recurrente del disco. Localización de una foto: 
Hanoi, Vietnam.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Markierungsfahne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vietnam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufsatz von Hanoi</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
